title: Flaming corpse
data:

| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A black, thoroughly charred cadaver covered in unquenchable fire, likely the remains of some unfortunate adventurer. It now rushes madly through the dungeon, seeking to share its fate with others. |

## Useful Info

**Flaming corpses** are literally [fiery](/Fire "Fire") undead cadavers rushing toward you to spread their flames. Their melee attacks inflict [Sticky Flame](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame"), and they run faster than the average character. They are fortunately rare, appearing most often in [the Crypt](/The_Crypt "The Crypt") and [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), but occasionally spawning in the middle-[Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon").

## Tips & Tricks

- [Yredelemnul](/Yredelemnul "Yredelemnul") worshipers may receive flaming corpses as pets at high [piety](/Piety "Piety").
- If taking them out quickly at range isn't an option, bring high [fire](/Fire "Fire") resistance or [mottled dragon armour](/Mottled_dragon_armour "Mottled dragon armour"), and [conservation](/Conservation "Conservation") to protect your scrolls.
- While they normally avoid [shallow water](/Shallow_water "Shallow water"), if you can [confuse](/Confusion "Confusion") one into falling in, its fire goes out, rendering it [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible") but much less dangerous.

## History

- Flaming corpses were removed in [0.15](/0.15 "0.15").
- Prior to [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), flaming corpses had [human intelligence](/Category:Human_intelligence "Category:Human intelligence").
- Flaming corpses were added in [0.5](/0.5 "0.5"). They were the first monster with [Sticky Flame resistance](/Category:Sticky_flame_resistance "Category:Sticky flame resistance").
html:
Flaming corpse

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
flaming corpse z 
HP 30-58
HD 8
XP 613
Speed 12
AC 12
EV 13
Will 42
Attack1 20 (hit: sticky flame)


Resistances damnation, rPois+++,
rN+++, rTorm,
rRot+++, rSticky,
rDrown
Vulnerabilities Holy, Holy wrath, Water
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Undead
Size Medium
Type flaming corpse, flaming corpse
Flags Evil
Glows
Sense invisible
A black, thoroughly charred cadaver covered in unquenchable fire, likely the remains of some unfortunate adventurer. It now rushes madly through the dungeon, seeking to share its fate with others.

Useful Info

Flaming corpses are literally fiery undead cadavers rushing toward you to spread their flames. Their melee attacks inflict Sticky Flame, and they run faster than the average character. They are fortunately rare, appearing most often in the Crypt and the Abyss, but occasionally spawning in the middle-Dungeon.

Tips & Tricks

  • Yredelemnul worshipers may receive flaming corpses as pets at high piety.
  • If taking them out quickly at range isn't an option, bring high fire resistance or mottled dragon armour, and conservation to protect your scrolls.
  • While they normally avoid shallow water, if you can confuse one into falling in, its fire goes out, rendering it invisible but much less dangerous.

History

  • Flaming corpses were removed in 0.15.
  • Prior to 0.8, flaming corpses had human intelligence.
  • Flaming corpses were added in 0.5. They were the first monster with Sticky Flame resistance.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Flaming_corpse&oldid=63552"
